title: Beginners Guide to KDP Niche Research
description:
Are you struggling to make sales on Amazon KDP and wondering, “Why isn’t my book selling?” 🤔 You’re not alone! In this video, I break down 5 powerful ways to know if a niche is profitable or not — so you can stop wasting time on unprofitable niches and start publishing books that actually sell! 📚💰

You’ll learn:
✅ How to research demand before publishing
✅ The signs of a saturated or dead niche
✅ What to check on Amazon before choosing your next keyword
✅ How to analyze competitors the smart way
✅ Tools and tricks to confirm if your niche can make consistent sales

Whether you’re a beginner on Amazon KDP or you’ve been publishing for a while with no results, this video will help you understand what really makes a niche profitable — and how to avoid common mistakes that stop your books from selling.
